meanings.definition: The quality or state of being fruity.
meanings.sent1: The fruitinesses of the smoothie made it a refreshing treat.
meanings.sent2: I love the fruitinesses of the tropical fruits in this salad.
meanings.sent3: The fruitinesses of the pineapple juice brought a smile to her face.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had a hint of fruitinesses, making the room feel brighter.
meanings.sent5: The fruitinesses of the ripe strawberries filled the kitchen with a sweet aroma.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a fruity flavor or aroma.
meanings.sent1: The wine connoisseur appreciated the fruitinesses of the Merlot.
meanings.sent2: The fruitinesses of the peach cobbler made it a crowd favorite.
meanings.sent3: The fruitinesses of the air freshener made the room smell like a fruit basket.
meanings.sent4: Her perfume had a hint of fruitinesses that lingered in the air.
meanings.sent5: The fruitinesses of the freshly baked pie filled the kitchen with a delightful scent.
